author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thirty persons were injured after the mini-van they were travelling in bound to Hogenakkal turned turtle along the Hogenakkal road on Thursday.

The injured were among an extended group of family members that was heading to Hogenakkal to perform bereavement rituals.

The driver of the mini-van reportedly lost control of the vehicle. Those injured were admitted to Pennagaram Government Hospital.
title: 30 hurt in accident
